entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
